properties.validation_message: Enter the pixel dimensions that the image should be cropped to (ex. 100x100)

product_missing_long.value: This item was not found. Be sure that you have entered a valid product code or try a different value.

product_unavailable_long.value:
This item is unable to be purchased. It is likely out-of-stock or it has an invalid attribute selection.
